comment.content: Hi Jihyun, thank you for reaching out. We're sorry to hear about your earring. While our lost pieces policy is set in place to maintain fairness with all of our customers, we understand your disappointment and the feedback from your experience has been noted and shared. That said, our Customer Experience Team is always here to chat and can be reached directly via email at contact@mejuri.com.

reviews.content: I previously ordered the huggie hoops. They were beautiful but there was a small gap between the hoop and my earlobe. I returned for these and they are perfect 'wear all the time' hoops. Very happy!
